channel.title: MoparScape Help
channel.description:
Im currently using mopar scape..since it's the onlyu one i know how to use. But it doesn't have any compilers or anything in which i should edit the codes. I want to do the Ultimate mod script, but i don't know where to place it.
also, when i make my server, and invite my friend, the game sometimes loses connection and freezes. Like, all the time, after 3 minutes of playing.
And wen i us the thing ::setobject. My friend doesn't see the changes i made to the object, normal.
Please answer these questions as soon as possible
